item.description:
Hello Everybody,

Next meeting this month is at my apartment in the Back Bay.

Dates and times are


WednesdayJune 18 @ 7:00-9:00 pm

Please note there IS NO PARKING. PLEASE BE ON TIME.

Rules:

PLEASE SAY "YES" ONLY IF YOU ARE SURE
PLEASE ARRIVE 10 MINUTES EARLY. GAME STARTS ON TIME
GAME TIME IS 2 HOURS.
EACH TEAM IS ASSIGNED A COMMENTATOR.
AT THE END OF EACH GAME, WE HOLD A COMMENTATOR SESSION FOR 10 MINUTES FOR EACH TEAM.
COMMENTATORS DISCUSS THE RISKS AND REWARDS TAKEN BY EACH TEAM MEMBER

GAME FEE IS $5 PER PLAYER.
THANK YOU

EDAN BARSHAN
ORGANIZER
item.why: Kiyosaki's CASHFLOW101 challenges the players' current ways of thinking about money and opens their eyes to how the RICH see it. It's exhilarating to see the AHA! moments dawning on the players as the game progresses. What a rush when it's YOU!
item.name: The Metro Boston Cashflow June Meeting
